final_production_data.main_heading: Disney+ and Hulu Bundle on Sale for Black Friday
headlines: Bundle drops to $5 per month for one year
Deal offers savings for streaming services
Take advantage of the limited-time offer
final_production_data.tts_script: The Disney+ and Hulu bundle drops to $5 per month for one year for Black Friday. This deal offers savings for streaming services.

original_raw_news.original_title: The Disney+ Hulu bundle drops to $5 per month for one year for Black Friday
